## Introduction

```{r}

N <- 100
N_A <- floor(N/3)
N_B <- N - floor(N/3)

df <- data.frame(
  USUBJID = paste0("id-", 1:N),
  ARM = rep(c("A", "B"), c(N_A, N_B)),
  response =  c(sample(c(T,F), N_A, TRUE , prob = c(.6, .4)), sample(c(T,F), N_B, TRUE,  prob = c(.7, .3))),
  s1 = sample(c("s11", "s12", "s13"), N, TRUE)
)

head(df)
```
